Title: ASP.net MVC HTML5 Helpers Toolkit
Description: The ASP.net MVC HTML5 Helpers Toolkit contains a rich set of controls that you can use to build ASP.net websites using HTML5. Harness the power of HTML5 and start using it in your applications.It's lightweight and can be a great step in getting your website up to speed with HTML5
HomeWiki:
Project Description

The ASP.net MVC HTML5 Helpers Toolkit contains a rich set of controls that you can use to build ASP.net websites using HTML5. Harness the power of HTML5 and start using it in your applications.It's lightweight and can be a great step in getting your website up to speed with HTML5

Latest Updates

09/08/2013 -
  • Uses Model metadata to determine input type. You no longer need to pass in an input type.
  • Added support for model validation

13/11/2012 -
Updated the HTML5 TexboxFor's to use an input type of Number.

14/08/2012 -
Updated HTML5 Password Input to not set value in the HTML. This has been updated for security reasons.

06/08/2012
Updated HTML tags to use self closing format eg. (/> instead of </>)

14/05/2012
Updated demo project to use MVC4 and Twitter Bootstrap.
Password input type has also been added to the list.

Additional Information

For more information please go to: http://www.deanhume.com/Home/BlogPost/asp-net-mvc-html5-toolkit/29

Update

As another option to download the MVC HTML5 Toolkit has also been added the Nuget gallery. For more information
please visit the following article: http://deanhume.com/Home/BlogPost/asp-net-mvc-html5-toolkit-is-now-available-as-a-nuget-package/50
